author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.3.0-alpha.1` -- **Karanikomoru** -- released!
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.3.0-alpha.1

This alpha release contains the recent Capella and 4844 improvements, along with a ton of new tests for both features!

*Note*: There are a number of small changes under consideration for Capella and 4844. We expect another release soon â„¢ï¸ but want to provide a stable target for testnets in the meantime

***Thank you*** to the many many contributors ironing out and testing these specs ğŸ™‚
